author: barrettj
msg: Scope dynamic ports to the instance of the service that did the addPort(...).  Add TDD Unit test and flag to revert to previous behavior of sharing dynamic ports across services.

msg: Added support for 'RealmChoiceCallback' in the SaslCallbackHandler class of the API.
